doc.title: Pepe Vila Body Shop
doc.plot: "Pepe Vila Body Shop" is a uncompromisingly honest documentary which immerses you in the day to day life of Pepe Vila, the 64 year old Cuban exile who runs a small auto body shop in the heart of "Little Havana." Taped over a period of three years, on location in Miami, the documentary's intimacy will leave you feeling like a member of the family. "Pepe Vila Body Shop" focuses on the relationships within a family, the struggles of running a small family business, and the Cuban-American experience.
